JOB DESCRIPTION: Senior Software Engineer - GoLangWe are a 100% product development company and are looking for passionate, thoughtful and compassionate individuals who have experience of building backend applications in GoLang.We are primarily focused on helping our customers in addressing application performance problems. It is a challenging role with scope to dive deep into research and development in cutting-edge technologies. You will work with a cross functional product development team.Primary skills :- 7+ years of overall experience. Broad knowledge of the Go ecosystem, Python ecosystem - Django, Flask, etc.- Hands-on experience in Go and Python. C/C++ and Java experience is an advantage.- Knowledge of data structures, algorithms, parallel and concurrent code.- Awareness of Cloud & Containers (AWS / Docker/ Kubernetes).- You should be able to read GoLang code and grasp the concepts quickly.- You should be able to read Python code and grasp the concepts quickly.- Interest in researching topics such as memory management, benchmarking and profiling.

EDUCATION.UG: BCA in Computers, B.Sc in Any Specialization, B.Tech/B.E. in Any Specialization
